name: Bloberian Sewer Cleaning Co.
description:
You are controlling a blob that eat organic matter. Your purpose is to clean and unclog a sewer.

Sound Effect: 魔王魂

https://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/

Entry for  Brackeys Game Jam 2021#1
